text: The 2014 Football League Cup Final was a football match. It took place on 2 March 2014 at Wembley Stadium, London. It was the last match of the 2013â€“14 Football League Cup. The final was played between Premier League clubs, Manchester City and Sunderland. This was Manchester City's fourth League Cup final. It was their sixth Wembley visit since 2011. This was Sunderland's second League Cup final. It was their first visit to Wembley since 1998. ==Sources== Category:2014 in association football Category:Football League Cup Category:2014 in England Category:2010s in London Category:March 2014 events
title: 2014 Football League Cup Final
